item.title: AutoMute extension for Chrome
item.description: Sometimes, websites unexpectedly play sounds and that’s quite annoying, but you may not want to mute your computer as a whole, because you receive some other notifications. Then AutoMute extension for Chrome comes handy. It automatically mutes every tab you open, and prevent any sound from Chrome unless you unmute a tab.

item.title: Echoing in .bashrc clashes scp data transfer
item.description: One day when I tried to run scp to transfer data between my terminal and a server, the command somehow didn’t work. It was caused by echo in .bashrc. You have to make it conditional to interactive mode so that scp runs without the problem. Reference: http://stackoverflow.com/questions/12440287/scp-doesnt-work-when-echo-in-bashrc So, instead of just echoing, do like this: if [[ $- =~ "i" ]]; then echo something fi

item.title: Testing a new blog
item.description: I’ve tried some other blogging platforms but didn’t like any of them. Now here’s my new static site generated by Hugo and hosted by GitHub Pages. It’s simple, customizable, easy to switch to another platform and I like it, even though it obviously lacks comments and other dynamic functions. I’ll be using this site to put my cv and random posts mainly related to programming and bioinformatics research. Notes Platform: Hugo Host: Github Pages Theme: minimo When you forget markdown grammar: Markdown Cheatsheet How to deploy on your GitHub page: Hugo | Host on GitHub Edit deploy.
